title: [GAMEPLAY] Animation Spirit Fire Brand
body: When I turn on ctrl + 3 on the Spirit Fire {{champion:63}}  and go out of his animations and go back to it the animation is bugs and instead of seeing the ghosts + fire it is the same fire that floats in the air

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

Thanks for  the report! To clarify, are you starting and stopping the animation, or starting the animation, moving the camera off of him, and moving it back onto him? I'm able to repro what you're describing in the second scenario, but wanna make sure I'm not missing anything. :)

**EDIT:** I've resolved the issue for moving on and off screen, and that'll be ready for 7.23! I *think* that may also fix what you're describing, but lemme know!
